A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I think ths problem is\, is that Rian Johnson didn't go anywhere near what all the now-disappointed fanboys were predicting. I read one fan review that said they saw it opening night at an IMAX and no one laughed at anything.  I had the opposite experience - we saw it on Thursday and the theater was filled mostly with folks who were around for the original trilogy's original relases and we were all having a blast in the GFFA\, laughing\, cheering\, applauding.  Fantastic night.
